global_policy.description: Rejection occurs if aggregate cost exceeds threshold or if any single P1 metric limit is violated.

metrics.description: Quantifies algorithmic cost increase (e.g., cyclomatic complexity, memory usage delta) relative to baseline.
Measures future maintenance debt and external dependency friction.
Ensures transparency. Score decrease (degradation) relative to baseline must not exceed threshold.
Placeholder for future integration of structural entropy and state machine mutation tracking. Currently inactive.
